automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_sunset_warm_white_60'
alias: Office WLED Sunset Warm White 60%
description: "At sunset, set the Office WLED strip to a warm white tone at 60% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: sun
    event: sunset
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 60
      rgb_color: [255, 180, 120]
